mapper.update: update market where platformid = #{platformid} and moneypair = #{moneypair}
mapper.select: select b.platformid,a.name as platformName,a.urlicon as platformIcon, a.url as platformUrl,b.moneypair,b.moneytype,c.bitbcnname as moneytypeName, c.iconurl as moneytypeIcon,b.buymoneytype,c.currentcount as allMoneyCount from thirdpartyplatforminfo a join thirdpartysupportmoney b on a.id = b.platformid left join bitbinfo c on b.moneytype=c.bitbcode
